import React from 'react' // import web from "../src/images/m3.jpg"; // import wed from "../src/images/m1.jpg"; // import wem from "../src/images/m4.jpg"; import wec from "../src/images/f22.jpg"; const Donate = () => { const [username, setUsername] = React.useState(''); const [mobile, setMobile] = React.useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = React.useState(''); const [address, setAddress] = React.useState(''); const [state, setState] = React.useState(''); const [quantity, setQuantity] = React.useState(''); const [charity, setCharity] = React.useState(''); const [error, setError] = React.useState(false); const donate = async () => { console.warn(!username); if(!username || !mobile || !email || !address || !charity || !state || !quantity) { setError(true) return false; } console.warn(username, mobile, email, address, charity ,state, quantity); const userId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')); let result = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/mixdonate",{ method: 'post', body: JSON.stringify({username, mobile, email, address, charity, quantity, state, userId}), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" } }); result = await result.json(); console.warn(result); // localStorage.setItem("user", JSON.stringify(result)) // navigate('/') } return ( <> {/*
*/}
